title: Vitalik Buterin - Green Pill #1

description:
Vitalik Buterin is the founder of Ethereum and a researcher at the Ethereum Foundation. 

As the visionary behind the network, Vitalik's values are embodied within the ethos of Ethereum's community-centric nature.

Exploring quadratic funding, pluralism, and sybil resistance, we dive into why Vitalik cares about public goods and how we can utilize novel mechanisms to fund them elegantly. 

Take the Green Pill, anon.
